    • Method Detail

      • getLaser

        public boolean getLaser()
        This is for future use, use the laser information from the BandAndArrowIndicator1 from the most recent InfoDisplayInfoData object to know if laser alerts are present.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the laser bit is set, otherwise false is returned.

      • getKaBand

        public boolean getKaBand()
        Returns if the Ka band is active.
        Returns:
        True if ka band is active otherwise false.

      • getKBand

        public boolean getKBand()
        Returns if the K band is active.
        Returns:
        True if K band is active otherwise false.

      • getXBand

        public boolean getXBand()
        Returns if the X band is active.
        Returns:
        True if X band is active otherwise false.

      • getKuBand

        public boolean getKuBand()
        Returns if the Ku band is active.
        Returns:
        True if Ku band is active otherwise false.

      • getFront

        public boolean getFront()
        Returns if an alert is active in the front.
        Returns:
        True if there is a an alert in the front.

      • getSide

        public boolean getSide()
        Returns if an alert is active in the side.
        Returns:
        True if there is a an alert in the side.

      • getRear

        public boolean getRear()
        Returns if an alert is active in the rear.
        Returns:
        True if there is a an alert in the rear.

      • buildFromByte

        public void buildFromByte(byte _data)
        Sets this band arrow state information using the data inside of the passed in byte.
        Parameters:
        _data - Packed byte that contains band arrow information.
